text: Norma Delia Orizi (18 August 1942 – 29 April 2014) known by her stage name Norma Pons, was an Argentine actress and vedette. She was known for her roles in El hombre del año, Crimen en el hotel alojamiento, Adiós Sui Generis, and in El pozo. Pons was born in Rosario, Sante Fe, Argentina. Pons died on 29 April 2014 from a heart attack in Buenos Aires, Argentina, aged 70. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Argentina Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Norma Pons
